docs.lead_paragraph: Model Bianca Balta won applause of approval as she walked down the Dolce&Gabbana runway in an advanced stage of pregnancy. It was part of the designing duo's early Mother's Day present to women, a collection dedicated to moms.

headline.main: Dolce&Gabbana Pay Sentimental Tribute to Mothers in Milan
headline.print_headline: Dolce&Gabbana Pay Sentimental Tribute to Mothers in Milan

docs.snippet: Model Bianca Balta won applause of approval as she walked down the Dolce&Gabbana runway in an advanced stage of pregnancy. It was part of the designing duo's early Mother's Day present to women, a collection dedicated to moms.
